call_title: Ergo to Bitcoin Lightning Swaps | Analog Ergo | ErgoHack VIII

topics.title: ErgoHack VIII Project Goals and Setup
topics.summary: Presentation of the Ergo-Bitcoin Lightning Atomic Swaps project for ErgoHack VIII, outlining goals to establish Bitcoin testnet and Lightning environments, modify ErgoScript contracts to use SHA-256 pre-images, and execute proof of concept swaps. The team created Bitcoin Regtest Tooling with helper scripts for easy testing and development.

topics.title: Hash Pre-images vs Point-based Swaps Technical Overview
topics.summary: Explanation of hash pre-images as inputs to hash functions, their security requirements, and advantages over point-based swaps. Hash pre-images must be sufficiently random to resist rainbow table attacks and are already natively used in Lightning Network HTLCs, making them ideal for atomic swap protocols.

topics.title: Lightning Network Invoice and Pre-image Mechanics
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of how Lightning Network uses hash pre-images in invoices, where the payee generates a payment request containing amount and pre-image hash, and the payer receives the secret pre-image upon successful payment. This native Lightning implementation allows the pre-image to be reused as a secret in atomic swaps.

topics.title: ErgoScript Contract Modifications for Hash-based Swaps
topics.summary: Technical details of modifying the existing ErgoScript atomic swap contract from point-based to hash-based verification. Changes include removing curve generator variables, replacing point checks with hash verification using SHA-256 and fromBase16 functions to compare byte collections.

topics.title: Live Demonstration of Ergo-Lightning Atomic Swap
topics.summary: Complete live demonstration of the atomic swap process, from creating Lightning invoices and deploying ErgoScript contracts to claiming funds with pre-images. The demo showed successful cross-chain value transfer where node one received Lightning payment and node two claimed Ergo funds using the revealed pre-image.

topics.title: Project Roadmap and Community Participation
topics.summary: Announcement of upcoming public testnet launch and invitation for community participation in the Atomic Swap project. The team is seeking contributions and new ideas through their Discord channels and will post regular updates on development progress.
